statements: DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND report_name LIKE 'Quarterly%';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE total_transactions_count > 500 AND report_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM customers WHERE email = 'customer@example.com' AND phone_number = '+123456789'
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE account_name = 'Savings Account';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
